document.full_text: the operators of limewire agreed to pay record companies $105 million, ending a federal trial over copyright infringement damages owed by the once popular but now defunct file-sharing service.
document.title: lime wire to pay record labels $105 million, ends suit
lines_and_colors: the operators of limewire agreed to pay record companies $105 million, ending a federal trial over copyright infringement damages owed by the once popular but now defunct file-sharing service.
